mapper.sql: JLXH as jlxh,CBDJLXH as cbdjlxh,WFS as wfs,FS as fs,JBZG as jbzg,YLXSSZG as ylxsszg,QM as qm,RQ as rq,JGID as jgid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NIS_YLXSSZG ( JLXH , CBDJLXH , WFS , FS , JBZG , YLXSSZG , QM , RQ , JGID ) VALUES ( #{jlxh} , #{cbdjlxh} , #{wfs} , #{fs} , #{jbzg} , #{ylxsszg} , #{qm} , #{rq} , #{jgid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE NIS_YLXSSZG SET CBDJLXH = #{cbdjlxh} , WFS = #{wfs} , FS = #{fs} , JBZG = #{jbzg} , YLXSSZG = #{ylxsszg} , QM = #{qm} , RQ = #{rq} , JGID = #{jgid} WHERE JLXH = #{jlxh}
mapper.select: select date_format(rq, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as rq, case fs when '未发生' then '√' else '' end as wfs, case fs when '非难免' then '√' else '' end as fs1, case fs when '难免' then '√' else '' end as fs2, case jbzg when '在院' then '√' else '' end as jbzg1, case jbzg when '转科' then '√' else '' end as jbzg2, case jbzg when '出院' then '√' else '' end as jbzg3, case jbzg when '死亡' then '√' else '' end as jbzg4, case ylxsszg when '无变化' then '√' else '' end as ylxsszg1, case ylxsszg when '扩大' then '√' else '' end as ylxsszg2, case ylxsszg when '好转' then '√' else '' end as ylxsszg3, case ylxsszg when '愈合' then '√' else '' end as ylxsszg4, qm from nis_ylxsszg where cbdjlxh = #{cbdjlxh}
